title: Comprehensive study on the selection and performance of the best electrode pair for electrocoagulation of textile wastewater using multi-criteria decision-making methods (TOPSIS, VIKOR and PROMETHEE II)
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 363

Author(s): Tahmeed Ahmed, Amimul Ahsan, Md. Habibur Rahman Bejoy Khan, Tamzid Kamal Nahian, Rafiul Hasan Antar, Alvy Hasan, Md. Rezaul Karim, Md. Shafiquzzaman, Monzur Imteaz
